```{r}
library("RStoolbox")
library("dplyr")
library("purrr")
library("stringr")
library("abind")
library("sf")
library("ggplot2")
library("raster")
library("gdalUtils")
library("tidyr")
library("tmap")
source("data.R")
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

```{r}
x <- brick(params$x_path)
basins <- read.csv(params$basins)
y <- read_sf(params$y_path) %>%
  filter(Latitude > 1) %>% # artifact
  filter(Sub_basin %in% basins$Sub_basin)
ys <- y %>%
  split(.$Glaciers)
```

We'll train using glaciers from the Dudh Koshi basin, and test using those from
the Sun Koshi basin.

```{r eval = FALSE}
tm_shape(y) +
  tm_fill(col = "Glaciers", palette = c("#93b9c3", "#4e326a"))
```

```{r}
coords <- y %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  dplyr::select(Longitude, Latitude) %>%
  as.matrix()

k_centers <- kmeans(coords, params$n_patches)$centers %>%
  as.data.frame() %>%
  mutate(type = "centroid")

ggplot(y, aes(x = Longitude, y = Latitude)) +
  geom_point(aes(col = Glaciers), size = 0.6) +
  geom_point(data = k_centers, col = "red", size = 0.1, alpha = 0.4) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("#93b9c3", "#4e326a"))
```

```{r}
k_mat <- k_centers %>%
  dplyr::select(Longitude, Latitude) %>%
  as.matrix()
write_patches(params$x_path, ys, k_mat, params$out_dir)
```
